title: BBC Local Live: Derbyshire on Thursday 23 February 2017 - BBC News
summary: storm doris winds sweep across county .
woman 'lucky ' after tree falls on car .
derby market hall shuts over safety fears .
fire service helps devise 'smoke alarm for children ' .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: live updates for derbyshire have finished for the day but we 'll be back at 08:00 tomorrow with all the latest news , sport , travel and weather .

documents.title: east midlands weather update : winds to ease tonight
text: an amber warning for wind is valid until 20:00 , with rain and strong winds continuing to cause travel disruption .
wind and gusts will steadily ease over the course of this evening and overnight .
author: Alexandra Hamilton
BBC weather presenter

documents.title: our reporter struggles to get back to derby
text: our reporter pamela gupta has been trying to get back to the office from london since 09:00 .
on the plus side , she has managed to meet people along the way and is now currently in an uber .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: car got 'dorised '
text: looks like storm doris has struck again , causing more damage
@ twitterid @ twitterid bugger !
car got `` dorised '' at work today # stormdoris # doris # flyingdebris # dorisday # newbonnetneeded
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: strom doris : lorry stuck in lay-by
text: a515 newhaven .
one of many caught out by mother nature today .
# stormdoris
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: train tickets valid tomorrow
text: train tickets valid tomorrow
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: ashbourne leisure centre reopens
text: following the power cut in ashbourne earlier , the town 's leisure centre has now reopened .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: trains services suspended
text: train services are currently suspended and east midlands trains is asking people `` not to travel '' .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: scuba divers death 'accidental '
text: a coroner has recorded the death of an experienced scuba diver from belper as accidental .
neil fears drowned off the coast of south east spain in august 2015 while on holiday .
derby coroner 's court heard today there were no clear problems with his equipment - but the 51-year-old father did n't know he suffered from heart disease .
he lost consciousness while underwater .
author: Rory Gallimore
BBC Radio Derby

documents.title: another fallen tree a38 northbound
text: storm doris has taken down another tree on the a38 just after markeaton island .
drivers took matters into their own hands and moved the tree out of the way .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: trent barton to take train passengers
text: if you are experiencing delays on the trains , you can always opt for using the trent barton bus service
author: BBC Radio Derby

documents.title: fallen tree removed from a632
text: the fallen tree causing traffic disruption earlier has now been removed .
a632 chesterfield road - fallen tree removed and road reopened between matlock & chesterfield .
author: BBC Radio Derby

documents.title: chesterfield mp 's turbulent flight
text: had turbulent flight back from geneva .
landed at @ twitterid 45 minutes ago , but # stormdoris too windy to get a ladder up to the plane !
@ twitterid @ twitterid are you implying you are doomed to be inside the plane for hours yet ?
fearing so .
you 'll have to slide down the shoot !
i was up for that but not an option i 'm told .
that happened to me at inverness last year .
much worse for the passengers stuck on the plane for 2 hours , though !
it 's been an hour and a half now .
i 've a feeling we 're not in kansas anymore .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: another power cut in ashbourne
text: another power cut in our region this time in ashbourne .
there is currently a # powercut in # asbourne # de6 and surrounding .
we estimate to have the power restored by 17:00 .
jason
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: your photos : heanor
text: storm doris is continuing to sweep across the county .
thanks to stoneyford view for this taken in heanor .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: another road closed due to fallen tree
text: another tree falls this time on the a632 chesterfield road , which is closed at matlock golf course between matlock and chesterfield , according to derbyshire county council .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: fallen tree removed
text: b6012 at beeley - fallen tree now removed and road reopened .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: road closed due to overturned lorry
text: a623 peak forest closed between tideswell & barmoor clough due to overturned lorry .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: matlock town 's floodlight blown over
text: the chaos continues matlock town football club 's floodlight has been blown over .
the club said no-one was hurt when the floodlight fell and that they will `` assess the damage going forward '' .
remember , if you have any or stories to send us , drop us an email , tweet or a facebook message .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: jcb helps clear a6 after tree fall
text: it looks as if people are taking matters into their own hands
update on # a6 at # allestree .
some guy with a @ twitterid has made light work of clearing the road .
traffic now getting through .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: woman suffers suspected broken hip after tree hits car
text: a woman has suffered a suspected broken hip after a tree fell on to a car this morning , derbyshire police say .
the force said the incident occurred at about 08:06 on chatsworth road , rowsley .
the woman - who was freed from her car with the help of derbyshire fire and rescue service - was taken to the northern general hospital .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: tree causing disruptions on a6096
text: the trees are falling like flies today .
another one has fallen on the spondon to ilkeston route
spondon to ilkeston .
another tree over the road causing travel problems .
caution on approach .
# stormdoris # highways # travel
it looks like a very busy day for you all , keeping us safe on the county 's road .
keep up the good work & stay safe yourselves
thanks sir .
my route home in half hour , thanks for the heads up guys
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: why the name storm doris ?
text: i was a little baffled as to why today 's storm is called `` doris '' .
well , it seems `` doris '' was voted for by the public as part of the met office 's `` name our storms pilot scheme '' - which helped compile the list of storm names for 2016 to 2017 .
very straight-forward !
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: a52 blocked both ways on kingsley road
text: more fallen power cables due to storm doris
# traffic # stormdoris # a52 blocked on kingsley road both ways near the # a522 leek road junction in # kingsley due to fallen power cables
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: storm doris : fallen tree on wilmore road
text: wilmore road is currently blocked due to this fallen tree .
expect delays in the area .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: 'so many strangers are willing to help '
text: ms lowndes said : `` i 'm so grateful that so many strangers are willing to help . ''
she is hoping the wedding can take place at the end of april or early may .
author: Neil Heath
BBC News Online

documents.title: dying mum 'overwhelmed ' by wedding help
text: a woman with terminal cancer has said she feels `` very emotional '' after a number of businesses offered to help her and her partner get married .
sarah lowndes , 40 , from derby , was told the disease had spread to her bones in 2013 , and that it was incurable .
she and fiance david , who met driving buses , have received many offers including free venue hire , flowers , food and a wedding dress .
author: Neil Heath
BBC News Online

documents.title: woman 'lucky ' after tree falls on car
text: b6012 beeley to rowsley .
tree v car and a lucky female occupant escaping with minor injuries .
# stormdoris
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

text: earlier we mentioned mansfield road in breadsall being blocked due to a fallen tree .
here is a of said tree - which has caused long traffic delays this morning .
author: Jonathan Baker
Reporter, BBC Radio Derby

documents.title: your photos : 'doris the duck '
text: bicycle bob has sent us this photo of `` doris the duck '' in hazelwood - which was taken this morning .
bob told us : `` doris left her shower cap on given today 's forecast . ''
author: Twitter

documents.title: roads blocked due to fallen trees
text: etwall road , # willington , is blocked due to a fallen tree ; blagreaves lane , # littleover , is partially blocked by a fallen tree .
# stormdoris
stanley village has a fallen tree too people still driving far too fast ! !
stay safe it 's not worth it .
if it 's causing an obstruction please contact derby city council highways on 0333 2006981 or via
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: missing girl found
text: earlier in the week , we told you about lesharna stafford , from clay cross , who had been missing since 17 february .
thankfully , derbyshire police has just told us the 16-year-old was found last night .
the force said she is `` safe and well '' .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: drivers warned to stay safe
text: derbyshire fire and rescue service warns drivers
# stormdoris is starting to have an impact .
stay safe on the roads .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: storm doris : road blocked due to fallen tree
text: fallen tree in mansfield road , breadsall .
road blocked .
we 're on our way to sort it .
getting pretty wild out there .
take care on the roads .
author: BBC Radio Derby

documents.title: storm doris : calke abbey closed
text: it has just been confirmed calke abbey will be closed today due to the high winds from storm doris .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: power supply back on for some
text: looks like a few houses in langley mill should have their power back on
we 've got most supplies back on in # langleymill # ng16 , but are working to restore the remaining properties by approximately 13:30 .
jason
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: watch : smoke alarms 'fail to wake children '
text: watch : smoke alarms 'fail to wake children '
author: Fergus Walsh
Medical correspondent

documents.title: smoke alarm devised to wake children
text: a derbyshire fire investigator has helped to devise a smoke alarm that 's more likely to wake up children .
research completed by dundee university and derbyshire fire and rescue service found that unlike adults , children do n't tend to respond to the sound of the standard alarm .
author: Sally Swinfen
BBC Radio Derby newsreader

documents.title: storm doris : power cuts affect 48 homes
text: western power has informed us there are currently 48 houses in heanor and langley mill without power .
they are currently working on restoring power to the homes as soon as possible .
author: BBC Radio Derby

documents.title: storm doris : trains delayed and cancelled
text: not looking good on the trains right now .
author: Sarah Teale
East Midlands Today reporter at Leicester railway station

documents.title: fallen power cables block road
text: more traffic around the region
# traffic # stormdoris high offley road near the # a519 junction in # woodseaves partially blocked due to fallen power cables
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: storm doris : too windy to mill
text: storm doris has hit derbyshire and heage windmill has the brakes on , braced for 80mph winds .
author: Heidi Booth
Journalist, BBC Radio Derby

documents.title: storm doris shuts derby market hall
text: derby city council will be closing derby market hall due to fears of the high winds from storm doris damaging window panes .
the council has apologised to traders and shoppers for the closure .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

text: and here 's how today is looking
author: Charlie Slater
BBC Weather presenter

text: it 's looking very miserable and blue in belper this morning .
thank you to lindafrombelper for sending this photo in .

documents.title: travel : slow traffic on a52
text: there is slow traffic on queensway and also delays on the a52 pentagon island between victoria avenue and a61 sir frank whittle road .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: good morning : welcome to today 's live updates
text: good morning and welcome along to thursday across derbyshire .
i 'll be with you today with the region 's news , sport , weather and travel .
if you would like to share your and/or stories , then please get in touch via facebook , twitter or email .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live
